000 00000 	nop


/* -------------- STACK INSTRUCTIONS -------------- */

000 0 0001	pop <ofs16 as destofs>
000 0 0010	push_ofs <ofs16 as ofs>
000 0 0011	push_by_ofs <ofs16 as srcofs>
000 0 0100	push_b <imm8 as imm>
000 0 0101	push_w <imm16 as imm>
000 0 0110	push_d <imm32 as imm>
000 0 0111	push_q <imm64 as imm>
000 0 1000	swp
000 0 1001	sav <ofs16 as destofs>
000 0 1010
000 0 1011
000 0 1100
000 0 1101
000 0 1110
000 0 1111
000 1 0000
000 1 0001
000 1 0010
000 1 0011
000 1 0100
000 1 0101
000 1 0110
000 1 0111
000 1 1000
000 1 1001
000 1 1010
000 1 1011
000 1 1100
000 1 1101
000 1 1110
000 1 1111
